events.body:
ACK https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/19657/commits/fa4dfd215f62e88d668311701735c332c264fa2a :coffee: 
Code-reviewed, checked that all now redundant wait-for-connection constructs (`wait_until(... .is_connected, ...)`) after `add_p2p_connection(...)` in other tests were tackled and ran the functional tests locally.

Code review ACK fa4dfd215f62e88d668311701735c332c264fa2a

We should consider removing `CNodeNoVersionMisbehavior` either here or in a follow-up.

comments.body: Any reason not to remove this class entirely?
